title: PETITE JULIEN TRILLION CUT, LAB YELLOW SAPPHIRE GOLD BAR NECKLACE
description: Petite Julien features 5MM trillion-cut lab-grown yellow sapphires set between sleek 18k gold vermeil bars. Refined proportions make it versatile and wearable for everyday.
details:
Metal: 18k gold vermeil - a 2.5 micron layer of gold over sterling silver.

Setting: Bar set
Stone Type: Lab-grown yellow sapphire 

Stone Shape: Trillion cut 




15 inches, 14 CTW DEW 

16 inches, 14.5 CTW DEW
